pullRequest.title: Improve WordCount example
pullRequest.bodyText:
WordCount example started to use Observable but this example time to time finishes even before something from Observable is actually printed into the log => added 5 seconds sleep before it shutdowns Jet instance.
Checklist

 Tags Set
 Milestone Set
[N/A] Any breaking changes are documented
[N/A] New public APIs have @Nonnull/@Nullable annotations
[N/A] New public APIs have @since tags in Javadoc
[N/A] For code samples, code sample main readme is updated

nodes.bodyText: Is there any await() available? Forced sleeps don't provide best experience.
